title: Metamorphosis: An Annual Record of Transformation
description: "Metamorphosis" is both a weekly day-timer and transformational journal. This unique combination creates space to record events, while gently encouraging the process of regular reflection, transformation and growth throughout the year. Each of us are on individual journeys of transformation and growth, in the process of becoming the best version of ourselves. When completed, it becomes a beautiful keepsake for years to come for our selves and future generations.A portion of the proceeds from the sale of this book will be donated to the HAVEN Promoting the safety of women, children, youth & families
author: Rebecca Marklund
